content:
公路局北基二路 工程處 CONSTRUCTION OFFICE TAIPEI-KEELUNG NO. 2 HIGHWAY TAIWAN HIGHWAY BUREAU NO. 66 SECT. 3 NANKING EAST ROAD TAIPEI, TAIWAN
REF. NO.
DATE Aug. 2 1962
Mr. C. C. Chang, Chief Second Division Council for United States Aid Taipei, Taiwan
Dear Mr. Chang:
We have reviewed to Excess property list from your office and found that some of them are very useful for us. 許躍爾 Nine copies of needed items are enclosed here with, please contact AID to take necessary action on P/sp.
Your truly,
E. H. Jang E, H. Fang Chief, R. C. T. т. н. В.
國史饭 Academia Historica
59
